itunes:author: iBooks
title: Stephen Colbert: Meet the Author
description: Stephen Colbert sits down with radio host Jesse Thorn for an insightful conversation about his  book, I Am America (And So Can You!).
itunes:subtitle: Stephen Colbert reads from and discusses his book.
itunes:summary: Stephen Colbert captivates a standing room only crowd at the Apple Store in SoHo. After he shares choice sections from his new book, I Am America (And So Can You!), Colbert sits down with radio host Jesse Thorn for an insightful conversation.
itunes:keywords: Stephen Colbert, I Am America, the colbert report, jesse thorn, bullseye, the sound of young america, meet the author, apple store, apple store events, authors, books
